properties.entry: Beta 0.2.20|http://adf.ly/pTHhK
Beta 0.2.20|http://adf.ly/pTHhK
Pre 1.0.11|NO_LINK
Added a slew of NEI plugins, Force Furnaces, IC2 Force Machines, Iron Chest TileBox upgrading and the Book of Mudora. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Several bugfixes and tweaks, also added Storage Units and Forceaflouge Blocks. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
More than a dozen bugfixes pertaining to Force Machines, InvTweaks support for Storage Units and Force Packs and updated to Thaumcraft 4 API. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Emergency Patch: More than a dozen bugfixes pertaining to Force Machines, InvTweaks support for Storage Units and Force Packs and updated to Thaumcraft 4 API. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost

Bugfixes for various Item Card interactions and a possible ThaumCrash involving golems. More Thaumcraft aspects for DartCraft items and a way to recover 'impossible' research notes. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Bugfixes/Exploit fixes. The Magic Meter is here - added Chu Chus and Force Potions as well. No more unintended Infuser mooching. Serious config options. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Bug/Crash fixes and more config options. Mooch mode is back. (If configured) SS2 'support'. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Many bugfixes and even more config options. Treasure and Spoils Bags have been reworked. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Bugfixes and config options. Goodbye Refined Iron; hello Dart Iron! Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Bugfixes and stability updates. Added a configurable whitelist for Force Wrenchable TileEntities. Thermal Expansion Support. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Bugfixes and config options. Added the Time Upgrade, Throwable/Stackable Force Flasks and much more. Changelog/videos available at: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Emergency Patch! Fixed a possible crash on load in verbose mod packs.
Serious bugfixes and some additional config options.
Bugfixes and config options. Force Bursting, Fairy Fountains, Bombs and Skyblock friendly features have been added. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Generation bugfix. Hud options and in-game toggle hotkey with 6 preset locations. (Sneak + hotkey to toggle "ZeldaHud" as well.) Bonus UU recipes. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Initial version of Project Alchemy for Minecraft 1.7.10. It's a brand new world!
Fixed an exploit in the Atelier.
